_sText: Originally de_point was designed by unknown mapper and it had a lot of bugs. I've decided to repair it and re-design some parts of the map ;) Change log: 1. Terrorists don't spawn in front of the door anymore. 2. Added a breakable glass at terrorist spawn - it protects from kills at round start. It has only 1 hp, so you can destroy it very fast ;) 3. Added a ladder which makes possible to cross the fence at longway. 4. Crates on the long street don't block players anymore. 5. Deleted bugged room. 6. Fixed doors in building. 7. Added some decals. 8. A few textures changed. 9. Rotating block has been textured. 10. Created INACCURATE radar. INSTALATION: Players: just unpack the file into your \Steam\SteamApps\login\counter-strike source\cstrike directory Servers: If your server has tick 100, you have to run map with phys_timescale 1.5 parameter
